value:
$WmMPID_ティータ,ch10_30_Tita_F_Normal,Face|What a wonder Askr is. I've never
seen so many heroic figures all
gathered in one place!$k$p$WmMPID_外伝パオラ,ch10_28_Paora_F_Normal,Face|It's true. I've seen many things in
my travels and fought my fair share
of battles, but...$k$pBefore now, the largest battles I had
experienced had only a few people
of such a caliber on either side.$k$pSeeing so many Heroes gathered
together is a thrill!$k$p$WmMPID_リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_Normal,Face|Askr may be blessed with strength
in numbers, but that doesn't make
it invincible. Far from it, in fact.$k$pAs we have seen, dangers continue
stalking the kingdom even with this
many Heroes at its defense.$k$p$WmMPID_ティータ,ch10_30_Tita_F_Normal,Face|This many Heroes...$k$p$WmMPID_ジーク,ch10_31_Zeke_M_Normal,Face|It is unusual for you to look so
solemn, Tatiana... Is something
wrong? What worries you?$k$p$WmMPID_ティータ,ch10_30_Tita_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Zeke... It's just... Well...$k$pWith all of the Heroes here, it's likely
at least one of them knows about
your past, right?$k$p$WmMPID_ジーク,ch10_31_Zeke_M_Normal,Face|Perhaps... Perhaps not...$k$p$WmMPID_リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_Normal,Face|Ah... So, you are inflicted with an
unfortunate case of amnesia, eh?$k$p$WmMPID_ティータ,ch10_30_Tita_F_Normal,Face|I found him washed up on the shore,
on the brink of death, but I nursed
him back to health.$k$pEven though I restored his body,
I couldn't heal his memory. He had
to start over... A new life...$k$p$WmMPID_ジーク,ch10_31_Zeke_M_Normal,Face|I was unable to remember even my
own name. Emperor Rudolf, in his
benevolence, gave me this one.$k$pIt was also he who recognized the
one vestige of my former life: my
skill with a lance.$k$p$WmMPID_外伝パオラ,ch10_28_Paora_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ティータ,ch10_30_Tita_F_Normal,Face|When we fell in love, I prayed he
would never remember his past...
or any lover he left behind.$k$pThe other clerics said such selfish
desires would never sway the will
of the divine.$k$p$WmMPID_ジーク,ch10_31_Zeke_M_Normal,Face|Tatiana, that's—$k$p$WmMPID_ティータ,ch10_30_Tita_F_Normal,Face|I want what's best for Zeke, so...
I thought we could ask around to
see what we might learn.$k$pWill you help me, Palla? And you too,
Luthier! For Zeke?$k$p$WmMPID_リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_Normal,Face|I will do what I can, but I know just
as much about this place as any of
you three do.$k$p$WmMPID_ティータ,ch10_30_Tita_F_Normal,Face|Palla, you've been all over Valentia
and beyond in your travels, right?
Do you have any idea where to start?$k$p$WmMPID_外伝パオラ,ch10_28_Paora_F_Normal,Face|Hm. I suppose you have a point.
Let me think, and I'll see what
I can come up with.$k$p...$k$p...Who would possibly know more
about his early life? Hmm...$k$p
